meanings.definition: To outsnore: to snore louder than someone else.
meanings.sent1: Last night, my dad was outsnoring so loudly that he woke up the neighbors!
meanings.sent2: She always outsnores her brother during sleepovers.
meanings.sent3: The competition for outsnoring champion is fierce in our family.
meanings.sent4: His snoring was like a roaring lion, outsnoring all others in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of his outsnoring echoed through the house like thunder.

meanings.definition: Outsnoring: the act of snoring louder than someone else.
meanings.sent1: The outsnoring contest at the sleepover was hilarious.
meanings.sent2: His outsnoring kept everyone awake during the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The outsnoring sound coming from the room was like a symphony of snores.
meanings.sent4: She won the trophy for outsnoring at the family reunion.
meanings.sent5: The outsnoring in the dormitory sounded like a chorus of trumpets.
